Sentencas: The change in the mechanical and electrochemical performance of tape cast YSZ electrolyte as a function of doctor blade gap is investigated in this study via mechanical, microstructural and electrochemical analyses.
Titulo: The role of tape thickness on mechanical properties and performance of electrolyte supports in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Three point bending tests indicate that the flexural strength of the electrolyte can be improved by reducing the doctor blade gap.
Titulo: The role of tape thickness on mechanical properties and performance of electrolyte supports in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This can be elucidated by the microstructural observations, which reveal an increased number of small grains and reduced grain size with decreasing the doctor blade height, confirming the sintering shrinkage.
Titulo: The role of tape thickness on mechanical properties and performance of electrolyte supports in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The impedance results reveal that the electrical resistance of the electrolyte increases with decreasing the doctor blade gap due to reduced grain size.
Titulo: The role of tape thickness on mechanical properties and performance of electrolyte supports in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Similar behavior is also observed in the performance results.
Titulo: The role of tape thickness on mechanical properties and performance of electrolyte supports in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Therefore, the doctor blade gap can be considered as a critical parameter for the mechanical and electrochemical performance of tape cast YSZ electrolyte in solid oxide fuel cells, since it significantly affects the electrolyte microstructure.
Titulo: The role of tape thickness on mechanical properties and performance of electrolyte supports in solid oxide fuel cells
